mapper.insert: insert into t_artists(artist_id, artist_name, birth_date, death_date, description, date_time, city_id, theme_id, event_id) values(#{artistId},#{artistName},#{birthDate},#{deathDate},#{description},now(),#{cityId},#{themeId},#{eventId})
mapper.select: SELECT artist_id, artist_name, birth_date, death_date, description, date_time, is_del, city_id, theme_id, event_id FROM t_artists WHERE artist_id != 0 AND is_del = 1
SELECT artist_id, artist_name, birth_date, death_date, description, date_time, is_del, city_id, theme_id, event_id FROM t_artists WHERE artist_id = #{artistId} AND is_del = 1
